entry.title: 2013 drone strike on a wedding convoy
entry.content: ... that while the United States publicly denied any wrongdoing in a 2013 drone strike on a wedding convoy, it likely gave over $1 million in compensation to the victims' families?

entry.title: Frederic Willans
entry.content: ... that Sir Frederic Willans attended the deathbeds of Queen Alexandra and her son King George V?

entry.title: 2007 NFC Championship Game
entry.content: ... that the 2007 NFC Championship Game, with a temperature of −3 °F (−19 °C) and wind chill as low as −24 °F (−31 °C), was one of the coldest games in Lambeau Field history?

entry.title: Thomas Schubert
entry.content: ... that Thomas Schubert made his acting debut on the 2011 film Breathing, on the director's insistence that an amateur actor play the leading role?

entry.title: Nueva Vizcaya Agricultural Terminal
entry.content: ... that a study in 2024 found that about half of the 500 tonnes (1.1 million lb) of produce brought to the Nueva Vizcaya Agricultural Terminal daily was thrown out?

entry.title: the healthcare needs of intersex people
entry.content: ... that the healthcare needs of intersex people depend on what physical characteristics they have?

entry.title: Queen Isabella I
entry.content: ... that Queen Isabella I lost her first husband to politics, her second to assassins, her third to a window, and her fourth to fish?

Driving in China

China isn't one of the countries that foreigners commonly explore by driving themselves. If you'd still like to, the first step would be getting a local driving licence.

entry.title: Off the Beaten Path

Off the Beaten Path

Sekigahara

This quaint mountain town and battlefield, where Tokugawa won control of Japan, gives visitors firsthand insight into feudal Japanese warfare.

entry.title: Destination of the Month
entry.content:
Destination of the Month

Parahyangan

The West Javanese region centred around Java's third largest city of Bandung is an excellent place to hike and admire active volcanoes.
